QuestData.Title: Where's My Wolf?!
QuestData.Description: My frost wolf, Nerok, was captured with me and the others. I do not know where they are keeping him, but I'll bet the so-called "beastmaster" who dragged us here does.$B$BHe is at the beast pens nearby, boasting about his catch to the younger hunters.$B$BWe'll see how he boasts with my axe in his skull.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay Beastmaster Torash and free Nerok in Grom'gar.
QuestData.RewardText: Nerok and I are the only surviving prisoners, but we cannot leave just yet.
